amendment.description: Amendment directs the Secretary to submit a report within one year of enactment on implementation of corrosion prevention activities under section 1033 of the Water Resources Reform and Development Act of 2014 (33 U.S.C. 2350).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Esty amendment (A018) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Esty amendment (A018) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A018) offered by Ms. Esty.
